Texts.Chs: 当涉及到移民控制时，一些政府官员似乎完全没有注意到史莱姆们的存在。^green;生命回复, ^cyan;免疫^reset;：黏液减速、中毒和感电，^^reset;,orange;抵抗：火炎，^reset;^red;，弱点：寒气^reset;
Texts.Eng: When it comes to control of migration, certain government officials just don't seem to see slimes. ^green;Health regen, ^cyan;Immune^reset;: slime slow, poison, electricity,^reset; ^orange;^green;Resist^reset;: fire,^reset; ^red;^green;Resist^reset;: ice^reset;
